From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To reload the Cisco IOS microcode image on an ESCON CPA card in the Cisco 7200 series router, use the **microcode reload**command in privileged EXEC mode.
CLIs: microcode reload { all | ecpa [ slot <slot-number> ] | pcpa [ slot <slot-number> ] }

ParaDef.Info: Resets and reloads all hardware types that support downloadable microcode.
Resets and reloads only those slots that contain hardware type ecpa.
Resets and reloads only those slots that contain hardware type pcpa.
(Optional) Resets and reloads only the slot specified, and only if it contains the hardware specified.

Examples: The following example reloads the ESCON CPA microcode in slot 5 with the currently configured microcode:
ExtraInfo: Hardware types that do not support downloadable microcode are unaffected by the **microcode reload****all** command.You will be prompted for confirmation before the **microcode reload** command is executed.

RelatedCmds.description: Configures a default override for the microcode that is downloaded to the hardware on a Cisco 7200 series router.
Displays the microcode bundled into a Cisco 7000 series with RSP7000, Cisco 7200 series, or Cisco 7500 series router.
